transcript:
if you ever struggle with low mood and
then ask yourself why me why can't i
just be happy like the next person i'm a
psychologist and i want you to know that
even when you're depressed there's
nothing fundamentally wrong with your
brain
let me explain so your brain is this
complex system just like say the weather
and take england where it rains a lot
compared to spain where it hardly rains
at all there's nothing fundamentally
wrong with england there are just this
set of conditions that make it more
likely to experience rain more of the
time
and just small changes to those
conditions can have a big impact on that
overall system
the same is true for your brain if you
start making small changes to the
aspects of your life that influence your
brain you can set up this new pattern in
motion towards feeling very different
